nav.title: JJ
nav.subtitle: I design and build digital products, brands and experiences.

lawyerbc.title: Ministry of Justice Lawyer Search System
lawyerbc.description: Ministry of Justice Lawyer Search System, using blockchain for immutable data to ensure the credibility of lawyer information.

goPacket.title: goPacket
goPacket.description: goPacket are an mobile & web app for most accurate, automated, user-friendly application for tracking, managing, and accounting purposes.

idHub.title: ID Hub
idHub.description: Digital identity not only lowers costs and expands potential benefits for transactions but also employs modern cryptographic techniques to protect transactions from attacks. Especially the latter, enabling physical participation while ensuring safer, private, and more advantageous transactions.

goExplorer.title: goExplorer
goExplorer.description: goExplorer address integration for user-friendly assets on chain.

work.title: Work
work.content: I have over ten years of design experience with a solid foundation in graphic design, while also taking on the role of a frontend engineer. I am familiar with the design and development workflows and management, allowing me to provide the best and most suitable design solutions considering the overall team status.

skills.title: Skills
skills.content: Possess strong abstract, logical, and analytical thinking skills. Specialized in translating visual elements and behavioral interactions into systematic design specifications.

differentiation.title: Differentiation
differentiation.content: I am actively looking for opportunities to stand on the world stage, dedicated to truly touching users' hearts through experience and expertise.

interests.title: Interests
interests.content: I compose electronic music, skateboard, play drums, enjoy spatial design, and have a passion for street fashion and 'creating things'.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.content: I advocate for the Agile spirit, validating everything through User Stories.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.content: Iâ€™m a team player; my best work was done together with great people and companies.

management.title: Management
management.content: I have experience leading design and development teams, but I prefer a culture that prioritizes shared interests over reliance on management. I believe successful products stem from a spirit of innovation, a meticulous attitude, and constant refinement.
